content.rendered: Amish Sanghavi is a qualified finance professional with over 20 years of experience in the area of financial control, statutory audit and reporting, financial planning and budgeting, management and business performance reporting and transaction processing. Mr. Sanghavi is a fellow member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India and has passed all three levels of the CFA program. Mr. Sanghavi is based in Dubai, UAE.

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: James is a chartered accountant Chartered Accountant and CEO of Braemar Shipping Services PLC. Former Finance Director at Boosey & Hawkes Music Publishers Limited and Group Financial Controller of Carlton Communications PLC. Finance Director of Braemar Shipping Services plc from 2002 until his appointment as Chief Executive in June 2012.
